pages.title: Tiger Shark
pages.text: The tiger shark ($(o)Galeocerdo cuvier$()) is a species of requiem shark and the only extant member of the genus Galeocerdo.$(br2)It is a large macropredator, capable of attaining a length over 5 m ($(o)16 ft 5 in).

pages.title: Tiger Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
